[Answer]
answer: PolyAI has a geometric structure that resembles the letters "AI", and it consists of 1-(2,5-dimethylhex-3-yn-1-yl)-2-methylcycloprop-1-ene as its repeating unit.
pred: 1. Unlike other self-replicing (self-dividing) materials, PolyAI has a property that facilitates its self-assembly into sophisticated architecture. 2. The self-assembly of PolyAI is driven by a highly coordinated solvent, which is a characteristic feature of this novel material. 3. The molecular structure of PolyAI is such that it can bind a variety of solvents and thus has potential applications in device design.
